name: Tikyo Loves You
description:
The Prologue Of The Story...

It's December, 17th, 2019, You have a court appointment to go to. Hurry up before your late... But when u get there u discover a series of recordings in the form of notes that came from 1 other person that’s in the court house. How long will both of u last?...

What's Different About The Lighting In Tikyo Love's You Than In I'm Home?...

Tikyo Love's You features realtime lighting unlike I'm Home

Voice Actors

Vanderley5974X

Controls Mouse - Look Around WASD - Move Around Right Mouse Button - Zoom E - To Read Notes Left Shift - Sprint
